Melee Weapon Attack:
 +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage
plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

features.Blind Senses: . The grimlock can't use its blindsight while deafened and unable to smell.
The grimlock has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
The grimlock has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

name: Grimlock
senses: blindsight 30 ft. or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 13
